availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on July 9, 1802 in Pennsylvania. Married Elizabeth Craig Knox on March 3, 1824. Worked as a machinist in Nelson County. Died in Nelson County, Kentucky on January 23, 1869.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Benjamin Jackman (July 9, 1802 - January 23, 1869)," Memorial #36599024, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=36599024 (accessed June 26, 2017).; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 353; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 77.
